original_text: When the fourteenth night had come, as we were being driven across the Adriatic Sea, about midnight the sailors suspected that they were nearing land.
korean_text: 열나흘째 되는 날 밤에 우리가 아드리아 바다에서 이리 저리 쫓겨가다가 자정쯤 되어 사공들이 어느 육지에 가까워지는 줄을 짐작하고

sentences.original_text: When the fourteenth night had come
as we were being driven across the Adriatic Sea
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 아드리아 해를 횡단하고 있을 때
